sections.heading: Why Fiordland Is a Natural Wonder
paragraphs: Fiordland National Park is one of the most breathtaking landscapes on earth. With towering fjords, cascading waterfalls, and lush rainforests, it feels like a world untouched by time.
It's a paradise for nature lovers, hikers, and wildlife enthusiasts.

sections.heading: Top Things to Do
list: Explore Glowworm Caves in Te Anau

sections.heading: Travel Tips
paragraphs: The weather can change quickly—carry waterproof clothing. Booking guided tours is recommended for the best experience.

sections.heading: Nearby Attractions
paragraphs: Check out Te Anau Lake, Mirror Lakes, and local wildlife sanctuaries around the region.
